001package fr.univavignon.pokedex.api;
002
003public class PokemonTrainerFactory implements IPokemonTrainerFactory {
004
005    @Override
006    public PokemonTrainer createTrainer(final String name, final Team team, final IPokedexFactory pokedexFactory) {
007        IPokemonMetadataProvider metadataProvider = new PokemonMetadataProvider();
008        IPokemonFactory pokemonFactory = new PokemonFactory();
009        IPokedex pokedex = pokedexFactory.createPokedex(metadataProvider, pokemonFactory);
010
011        return new PokemonTrainer(name, team, pokedex);
012    }
013}
